XMLRPC
=======

* http://trac-hacks.org/wiki/XmlRpcPlugin


dumping all wiki pages into txt files
---------------------------------------

::

    which tracwikidump.py
    /Users/blyth/env/bin/tracwikidump.py

    tracwikidump.py workflow_trac 


API documentation
-------------------

Open the `xmlrpc_url` in browser (ignore phishing warning) to see API docs
